homepage.title: Welcome to My Portfolio
homepage.text: I'm a junior web developer with experience in JavaScript and Go. I have completed over 20 projects and specialize in making responsive, interactive designs. (not accurate data)

calculator.text: #codeComment, On React, code of this project is really bad because I tried to use <0>UseReducer</0> and <1>UseState</1> at the same time. I won't make this mistake again and as a memory for the future I will leave it as it is, so it will be a reminder. Code took around 5 hours.

oasis.text: #CodeComment, On Next, this one is my first full-stack project, database as <0>Supabase</0> Login as <1>Auth js</1> . This is a project build by ending of the course, where out teacher <2>Jonas Schmedtmann</2> explained every step, and other possible options, the reasons why we choose one or another technology

portfolio.text: #CodeComment, So Portfolio, as you can see everthing, it's how it is. In order to have an easy way to introduce myself and my works, i create it. This one you see currently is Version : 3.1.0, Previous ones else than v: 3.0.0 are not exist. I'm keeping track of changelogs and updates only from v3.

dummy.text: #CodeComment, This section is added just to fill an empty ones to look better nothing else

welcome.title: Welcome guests!
welcome.text: If you have reached this page and reading it right now, I appreciate your efforts. If you wish to share feedback or ideas for my portfolio, feel free to leave a comment.
welcome.tip: Tip: You can comment on portfolio ratings, possible fixes, best practices, and bugs. Feel free to introduce yourself!
